    • 方法详细资料

      • measureView

        public static void measureView(View view,
                               int width,
                               int height)
        measure view if you want get view size before the view measured, you should call this method. E.g you want gei the view size on constructor method

        The width and height is a value or type, it can used like this. E.g： measureView(view, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT);

        参数:
        view - The view that will be measured
        width - the default width
        height - the default height

      • setMarginLeft

        public static void setMarginLeft(View view,
                                 int left)
        set margin left
        参数:
        view - the view
        left - value of margin left

      • setMarginTop

        public static void setMarginTop(View view,
                                int top)
        set margin top
        参数:
        view - the view
        top - value of margin top

      • setMarginRight

        public static void setMarginRight(View view,
                                  int right)
        set margin right
        参数:
        view - the view
        right - value of margin right

      • setMarginBottom

        public static void setMarginBottom(View view,
                                   int bottom)
        set margin bottom
        参数:
        view - the view
        bottom - value of margin bottom

      • setMargins

        public static void setMargins(View view,
                              int left,
                              int top,
                              int right,
                              int bottom)
        set view margin
        参数:
        view - the view
        left - value of margin left
        top - value of margin top
        right - value of margin right
        bottom - value of margin bottom
